alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:36PM EDT until March 31 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lake County in northeastern Ohio... Northern Ashtabula County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 1115 PM EDT. * At 1036 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Perry, or 8 miles northeast of Fairport Harbor, moving east at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Painesville, Ashtabula, Conneaut, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Perry, Austinburg, Kingsville, North Perry, Edgewood, Plymouth Center, North Madison and Kelloggsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
